tool_description: Performs comparative analysis between competitors using rating, sentiment, and review metrics to identify competitive positioning and advantages.

primary_competitor.description: Name of the primary competitor to benchmark against others

comparison_competitors.description: List of competitors to compare against the primary competitor

rating_data_source.description: Source identifier for aggregated rating data

sentiment_data_source.description: Source identifier for sentiment analysis results

keyword_data_source.description: Source identifier for keyword extraction results

benchmark_metrics.description: Metrics to include in benchmark: rating, sentiment, volume, keyword_overlap

significance_threshold.description: Threshold for determining statistically significant differences

include_recommendations.description: Whether to generate strategic recommendations based on analysis

error_messages: Missing competitor data: One or more specified competitors not found in the provided data sources.
Invalid data sources: One or more data source identifiers are invalid or inaccessible.
Insufficient data for comparison: Not enough review data available for meaningful competitive analysis.
Invalid benchmark metrics: Use metrics from [rating, sentiment, volume, keyword_overlap].
Significance threshold error: significance_threshold must be between 0.01 and 0.1.
usage: Provide competitor names and data sources from previous analysis tools. Configure benchmark metrics and thresholds. Returns detailed competitive positioning analysis.

performance_gaps.description: Performance differences between primary and comparison competitors

strength_areas.description: Areas where primary competitor outperforms others

improvement_opportunities.description: Areas where primary competitor lags behind competition

benchmark_summary.description: Comprehensive summary of competitive positioning and key insights
